plausibledeniability.create_password_explanation: A hamis tárhely jelszava nem lehet ugyanaz, mint az igazi tárhelyé
plausibledeniability.help: Bizonyos körülmények között arra kényszerülhetsz, hogy megadda jelszavadat. A pénzed biztonsága érdekében a BlueWallettel létrehozhatsz egy alternatív titkosított tárhelyet, alternatív jelszóval. Kényszer hatása alatt megadhatod az alternatív jelszavadat, ami után a BlueWallet az alternatív tárhelyedet fogja megnyitni. Ez ugyanúgy fog kinézni, mint egy igazi tárhely, azzal a különbséggel, hogy a pénzed teljes biztonságban lesz az elsődleges tárhelyen.
plausibledeniability.help2: Az alternatív tárhely teljesen működőképes, és akár egy kisebb összeget is elhelyezhetsz rajta, hogy hitelesebbnek tűnjön.
plausibledeniability.password_should_not_match: A hamis tárhely jelszava nem lehet ugyanaz, mint az igazi tárhelyé
plausibledeniability.title: Elfogadható tagadhatóság

pleasebackup.ask: Have you saved your wallet's backup phrase? This backup phrase is required to access your funds in case you lose this device. Without the backup phrase, your funds will be permanently lost.
pleasebackup.text: Kérlek írd le az alábbi emlékeztető szavakat egy papírlapra, és tedd el egy biztonságos helyre. Ez egy biztonsági mentés, amellyel helyreállíthatod a tárcádat egy másik eszközön.
pleasebackup.text_lnd: Please take a moment to save this LNDHub authentication. It's your backup you can use to restore the wallet on other device.
pleasebackup.title: A tárcád elkészült...

send.create_this_is_hex: Tranzakció hexadecimális formátumban, aláírva és küldésre készen.

send.details_adv_full_sure: Are you sure you want to use your wallet's full balance for this transaction?
send.details_error_decode: Error: Unable to decode Bitcoin address
send.details_no_maximum: The selected wallet does not support automatic maximum balance calculation. Are you sure to want to select this wallet?
send.details_no_multiple: The selected wallet does not support sending Bitcoin to multiple recipients. Are you sure to want to select this wallet?
send.details_no_signed_tx: The selected file does not contain a signed transaction that can be imported.
send.details_total_exceeds_balance: A megadott összeg nagyobb, mint a tárca elérhető egyenlege
send.details_wallet_before_tx: Before creating a transaction, you must first add a Bitcoin wallet.
send.permission_camera_message: We need your permission to use your camera
send.permission_storage_message: BlueWallet needs your permission to access your storage to save this transaction.
send.psbt_this_is_psbt: This is a partially signed bitcoin transaction (PSBT). Please finish signing it with your hardware wallet.
send.qr_error_no_qrcode: The selected image does not contain a QR Code.
send.qr_error_no_wallet: The selected file does not contain a wallet that can be imported.
send.txSaved: This transaction has been saved in {filePath}

settings.about_free: BlueWallet is a free and open source project. Crafted by Bitcoin users.
settings.default_desc: When disabled, BlueWallet will immediately open the selected wallet at launch.
settings.electrum_error_connect: Can't connect to provided Electrum server
settings.electrum_saved: Your changes have been saved successfully. Restart may be required for changes to take effect.
settings.electrum_settings_explain: Set to blank to use default
settings.encrypt_decrypt_q: Are you sure you want to decrypt your storage? This will allow your wallets to be accessed without a password.
settings.encrypt_use_expl: {type} will be used to confirm your identity prior to making a transaction, unlocking, exporting or deleting a wallet. {type} will not be used to unlock an encrypted storage.
settings.general_adv_mode_e: When enabled, you will see advanced options such as different wallet types, the ability to specify the LNDHub instance you wish to connect to and custom entropy during wallet creation.
settings.general_continuity_e: When enabled, you will be able to view selected wallets, and transactions, using your other Apple iCloud connected devices.
settings.language_restart: When selecting a new language, restarting BlueWallet may be required for the change to take effect.
settings.lightning_saved: Your changes have been saved successfully
settings.lightning_settings_explain: Saját LND-csomóponthoz való csatlakozáshoz telepítsd az LndHub-ot és írd be az URL-ét alul. Hagyd üresen, ha a BlueWallet saját LNDHub-jához (lndhub.io) szeretnél csatlakozni. A beállítások mentése után, minden újonnan létrehozott tárca a megadott LDNHubot fogja használni.
settings.password_explain: Add meg a jelszót, amivel majd dekódolhatod a tárhelyet
settings.groundcontrol_explanation: GroundControl is a free opensource push notifications server for bitcoin wallets. You can install your own GroundControl server and put its URL here to not rely on BlueWallet's infrastructure. Leave blank to use default

transactions.cancel_explain: We will replace this transaction with the one that pays you and has higher fees. This effectively cancels transaction. This is called RBF - Replace By Fee.
transactions.cpfp_exp: We will create another transaction that spends your unconfirmed transaction. The total fee will be higher than the original transaction fee, so it should be mined faster. This is called CPFP - Child Pays For Parent.
transactions.enable_hw: This wallet is not being used in conjunction with a hardwarde wallet. Would you like to enable hardware wallet use?
transactions.rbf_explain: We will replace this transaction with the one with a higher fee, so it should be mined faster. This is called RBF - Replace By Fee.

wallets.add_entropy_remain: {gen} bytes of generated entropy. Remaining {rem} bytes will be obtained from the System random number generator.
wallets.add_lndhub_error: The provided node address is not valid LNDHub node.
wallets.details_del_wb_err: The provided balance amount does not match this wallet's balance. Please, try again
wallets.details_del_wb_q: This wallet has a balance. Before proceeding, please be aware that you will not be able to recover the funds without this wallet's seed phrase. In order to avoid accidental removal this wallet, please enter your wallet's balance of {balance} satoshis.
wallets.import_error: Importálás sikertelen. Ellenőrizd, hogy helyes adatokat adtál-e meg.
wallets.import_explanation: Írd be a kulcsszavaidat, a titkos kulcsodat, WIF-et, vagy bármi mást. A BlueWallet megpróbálja kitalálni a helyes formátumot, és importálja a tárcádat
wallets.list_empty_txs1_lightning: A Lightning tárcát a mindennapi tranzakcióidhoz használhatod. A tranzakciók azonnal végrehajtódnak, minimális átutalási díjjal.
wallets.list_empty_txs2_lightning: A kezdéshez kattints a "Kezelés"-re, és töltsd fel az egyenleged.
wallets.list_header: A wallet represents a pair of a secret (private key) and an addressyou can share to receive coins.
wallets.list_import_error: An error was encountered when attempting to import this wallet.
wallets.list_import_problem: There was a problem importing this wallet
wallets.select_no_bitcoin: There are currently no Bitcoin wallets available.
wallets.select_no_bitcoin_exp: A Bitcoin wallet is required to refill Lightning wallets. Please, create or import one.
